>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/files/roomtemplate/{id}/public"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the public settings of the room template with the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","description":"The room template ID.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":9846}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
